description: I'm not sure if this is a bug or not but I've noticed this a few times. If I have a nova.conf in my ~ nova will use that over the one in /etc/nova. I personally like the way that quantum does this with --config-file /etc/quantum/quantum.conf so that we always know the file that it's using.
title: which nova.conf to use
